Description: Book of the Dead; frame 1 (three fragments); black and red ink; part of full colour vignette; yellow border.
Curator's comments: See B. Luescher, Totenbuch-papyrus Neuchatel Eg. 429 und Princeton Pharaonic Roll 2 (BAA 1, Basel 2007), 16.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (133548) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/133548)
